fields.name: emis_grant
fields.question: How much of your annual capitation grant have you received this term? Reply with ONE of the following 0%, 25%, 50%, 75% or 100%

fields.name: emis_inspection
fields.question: What date was your last school inspection?

fields.name: emis_cct
fields.question: What date was your last CCT visit?

fields.name: emis_classroom
fields.question: How many classrooms does your school have for each class?

fields.name: emis_classroom_use
fields.question: How many classrooms are in usen at your school for each class?

fields.name: emis_latrines
fields.question: How many latrine stances does your school have for boys, girls and teachers?

fields.name: emis_latrines_use
fields.question: How many latrine stances are used by boys, girls and teachers?

fields.name: emis_teachers
fields.question: How many male and female teachers are deployed at your school?

fields.name: emis_boys_enrolled
fields.question: How many boys are enrolled in classes p1-p7 at your school?

fields.name: emis_girls_enrolled
fields.question: How many girls are enrolled in classes p1-p7 at your school?

fields.name: emis_smc_meals
fields.question: How many children did you observe having a meal at lunch today, Reply with ONE of the following- none, very few, less than half, more than half, very many

fields.name: emis_grant_notice
fields.question: Has UPE capitation grant been display on school notice board? Answer YES or NO

fields.name: emis_inspection_yesno
fields.question: Do you know if your school was inspected this term? Answer YES if there was inspection and NO if there was no inspection

fields.name: emis_meetings
fields.question: How many SMC meetings have you held this term?Give number of meetings held, if none, reply 0.

fields.name: emis_absence
fields.question: Do you know if the head teacher was present at school today? Answer YES or NO

fields.name: emis_abuse
fields.question: How many abuse cases were recorded in the record book this month?

fields.name: emis_meals
fields.question: How many children had meals at lunch today? Reply with ONE of the following - none, very few, less than half, more than half, very many

fields.question: What is the name of your district?

fields.question: What is the name of your sub county?

fields.question: What is the name of your school?

fields.name: emis_many_school
fields.question: Name the schools you are resonsible for.Separate each school name with a comma, for example "St. Mary Secondary,Pader Primary"

fields.name: emis_name
fields.question: What is your name?

fields.name: emis_role
fields.question: Thank you for participating in EdTrac. What is your role? Choose ONE: Teacher, Head Teacher, SMC, GEM
